text:
Amazon will pay $500 million in one-time bonuses to employees for working during the #COVID19 pandemic.

That’s just ~1.4% of how much Jeff Bezos’s net worth has grown during the pandemic: at least $36.2 billion. The company also ended hazard pay in early June. https://t.co/wtRSM5KxHP
